actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize a program of research and development of alternative propulsion systems for automotive vehicles in commerce.
short_title: Automotive Transport Research and Development Act

summary.text: Automatic Transport Research and Development Act - Provides for an immediate and intensive national research and development program to produce, within 3 years, a motor vehicle engine system that is clean, quiet, energy-efficient, safe, and suited to existing patterns of life. Authorizes the Low-Emission Vehicle Certification Board established under the Clean Air Act to carry out the program under this Act. Authorizes the Board to develop vehicles which will comply with clean air standards and future emission standards that Congress may enact to protect public health and welfare in high-population density areas.

titles.title: Automotive Transport Research and Development Act
A bill to authorize a program of research and development of alternative propulsion systems for automotive vehicles in commerce.
